experiences.title: Mobile Engineer
description: Development of a React Native application for an online publisher with 3 million+ active monthly users, achieving an increase in engagement and revenue.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to configure native APIs and SDKs.
Maintained and updated legacy infrastructure, achieving improved performance and a 99% crash-free user rate.
Spearheaded the mobile transition to TypeScript and React-Native framework updates.
Multi-platform SDK development with custom native module authoring using Kotlin, Java, Objective-C, and Swift.
Increased shipping of revenue-driving products through new development workflows for improved engineering efficiency.

experiences.title: Sales Expert - Mobile
description: Resolved complex technical issues for iOS, Android, and IoT devices, boosting customer satisfaction and revenue.
Managed critical customer billing and support issues, showcasing problem-solving and interpersonal skills.
Contributed significantly to the store's top 10% performance in the region by driving personal and store KPIs.

experiences.title: Principal Helpdesk Engineer
description: Administered IT solutions focusing on security and HIPAA compliance for over 120 clients.
Developed and implemented full-stack solutions to streamline client services and operational efficiency.
Optimized technology maintenance, reducing user-issue resolution time and increasing ticket close rate.
